youtube.title: How Balloon Sinuplasty Works: Step-by-Step Medical Animation
youtube.description: Discover the science behind Balloon Sinuplasty. This 3D medical animation shows how a small catheter and balloon are used to dilate blocked sinus passages, restoring natural drainage and providing relief from chronic sinusitis without invasive surgery.
